Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: O[A7sus] Church, ari[D]se and put your [G/B]armor [A/C#]on Hear the [D/F#]call of [G]Christ,our [Asus]Ca[A]p - [D]tain For n[A7sus]ow the [D]weak can say that [G/B]they are [A/C#]strong In the [D/F#]strength that [G]God has [Asus]gi [A]- [D]ven With [D/F#]shield of [G]faith and [D/F#]belt of [A]truth We’ll [D/F#]stand a[G]gainst the [D/F#]de - [Bm]vil’s [A]lies An [A7sus]army [D]bold whose battle [G/B]cry is [A/C#]love Reaching [D/F#]out to [G]those in [Asus]da - [A]rk - [D]ness [Dsus D]
Verse 2: Our [A7sus]call to [D]war to love the [G/B]captive [A/C#]soul But to [D/F#]rage a[G]gainst the [Asus]ca - [A]p - [D]tor And [A7sus]with the [D]sword that makes the [G/B]wounded [A/C#]whole We will [D/F#]fight with [G]faith and [Asus]v - [A]a - [D]lor When [D/F#]faced with [G]trials on [D/F#]every [A]side We [D/F#]know the [G]outcome [D/F#]is [Bm]se[A]cure And [A7sus]Christ will [D]have the prize for [G/B]which He [A/C#]died And in[D/F#]heri[G]tance of [Asus]n - [A]a - [D]tions [Dsus D]
{new_page} Verse 3: Come [A7sus]see the [D]cross where love and [G/B]mercy [A/C#]meet As the [D/F#]Son of [G]God is [Asus]str - [A]ick - [D]en Then [A7sus]see His [D]foes lie crushed be[G/B]neath His [A/C#]feet For the [D/F#]Conquer - [G]or has [Asus]r - [A]i - [D]sen And [D/F#]as the [G]stone is [D/F#]rolled a[A]way And [D/F#]Christ e[G]merges [D/F#]from [Bm]the [A]grave This [A7sus]victory [D]march continues [G/B]till the [A/C#]day Every [D/F#]eye and [G]heart shall [Asus]se - [A]e - [D]Him [Dsus D]
Verse 4: So [A7sus]Spirit, [D]come put strength in [G/B]every [A/C#]stride Give [D/F#]grace for [G]every [Asus]hu - [A]r - [D]dle That [A7sus]we may [D]run with faith to [G/B]win the [A/C#]prize Of a [D/F#]servant [G]good and [Asus]fai - [A]th - [D]ful As [D/F#]saints of [G]old still [D/F#]line the [A]way Re[D/F#]telling [G]triumphs [D/F#]of - [Bm]His [A]grace We [A7sus]hear their [D]calls and hunger [G/B]for the [A/C#]day When with [D/F#]Christ we [G]stand in [Asus]gl - [A]o - [D]ry [Dsus D]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 o church arise and put your armor on hear the call of christour cap tain for now the weak can say that they are strong in the strength that god has gi ven with shield of faith and belt of truth well stand against the de vils lies an army bold whose battle cry is love reaching out to those in da rk ness verse 2 our call to war to love the captive soul but to rage against the ca p tor and with the sword that makes the wounded whole we will fight with faith and v a lor when faced with trials on every side we know the outcome is secure and christ will have the prize for which he died and inheritance of n a tions verse 3 come see the cross where love and mercy meet as the son of god is str ick en then see his foes lie crushed beneath his feet for the conquer or has r i sen and as the stone is rolled away and christ emerges from the grave this victory march continues till the day every eye and heart shall se e him verse 4 so spirit come put strength in every stride give grace for every hu r dle that we may run with faith to win the prize of a servant good and fai th ful as saints of old still line the way retelling triumphs of his grace we hear their calls and hunger for the day when with christ we stand in gl o ry
